string_table.str: Increase your population cap with the Reserves upgrades at the Armory.
Reinforcements will be provided for you through the LZ.
Reinforcements will arrive periodically.
All leader powers are unlocked and the cool down has been reduced, make them count, Commander.
Restoration Drones 3 is now available to unlock and purchase in the Leader Power Radial.
Use the Holo Decoy leaderpower to help distract the enemy when you are trying to take a control point.
Remember to upgrade your Headquarters to gain access to tier 3 units and upgrades.
The Condor's special ability, the mini-mac, fires a highly damaging Gauss barrage.
The Condor is the UNSC's super unit. The Condor is a slow moving but heavily armoured gunship, armed with powerful ballista mini-mac.
Damage inflicted below 50%
Prevent the Banished from inflicting more than 50% damage to the shield protecting Anders in the Control Room.
Keep the Control Room Shield over 50%
Brute Warlords Killed:
Brute Warlords are on the field. Kill them.
Kill the Brute Warlords
Retriever Sentinel
Retriever repairing
With Professor Anders' plan set in motion its time to take down the shield generator and gain access to the Control Room.
Reach the shield generator
UNSC Base defended
Defend the UNSC against Banished assaults
Defend the UNSC Base
Towers captured & held
Take and hold all of the Control Towers to give Anders time to hijack the Retriever.
Capture and hold the Control Towers
Scarabs Destroyed:
Destroy the Scarabs before they reach the control room.
Destroy the Scarabs
Defend the Professor and the Control Room from the Banished
Control Room Shield
Hold Out:
Hold Out:
Anders has found a solution, but requires a little extra time to set the actions into motion.
Hold Out for 2 minutes
Professor Anders Protected
The Professor is working to shut down the Halo, and leave a message for Earth. Keep the Banished away from her.
Defend the Professor and the Control Room from the Banished
Defend the Kodiak and the barrier from the Banished assault.
Repel the assault
Bravo base saved
Bravo base is under attack, send support.
Rescue Bravo base
UNSC forces recovered
The first landing force was wiped out by Banished attackers, but there are pockets of resistance left in the field. Find and reunite them.
Reunite the scattered UNSC forces
Retriever Sentinel taken out
Fend off attacks from the Retriever Sentinel, while capturing the Control Towers.
Fend off the Retriever Sentinel
Banished base destroyed
UNSC scouts report of a Banished base in the area, take it out and reduce their reinforcements.
Destroy the Banished base
Have control of all domination towers on the map at the end of the mission.
Win domination controlling all 3 points
Kodiaks protected
The Retriever cannot be killed but can be repelled and forced to repair.
Bravo base
Turrets upgraded
Upgrade your turrets to counter specific threats; air, vehicles and infantry.
Upgraded turret deployment
Tickets over 700
Prove your ability in Domination by keeping the enemy from 700 tickets.
Keep the enemy from having more than 700 tickets
Units lost to the Retriever Sentinel:
The Retriever is a deadly opponent, it might be better to avoid it and to focus on the Banished.
Lose no more than five units to the Retriever Sentinel
Scarab destroyed using Archer Missiles
Take down a scarab using Archer Missiles.
Take down a Scarab with Archer Missiles
Enemies killed with Vulture PHOENIX missile:
Use the Vulture's PHOENIX missile to kill 10 enemies.
Kill 10 enemies with the Vulture ability
Enemy Squads taken out
Use Anders' Retriever Sentinel to take out 20 enemy squads.
Use Anders' Retriever Sentinel to take out 20 enemy squads
Commanders killed:
Managed to kill the commanders within the time limit.
Kill the commanders within 10 minutes
On our way, Professor.
Mind if we tag along, sir?
We've taken out one of their Warlords.
Warlord out of action.
We've eliminated another Warlord.
Warlord down.
Roger, sir.
Let's focus on securing those towers, Red Team, everyone's counting on us.
Professor, bad news. There's a shield blocking our route through to the Control Room.
We've got them on the ropes, Captain, but it's only a matter of time before they send more.
That's Bravo base and it's under attack! Take it back and clear out the area!
Red Team, do everything you can to protect the Professor.
Soldier, captain says you're to join up with us.
We'll get it done, sir.
Hold the line, Red Team!
That's the first tower, Professor.
H
Copy that, sir. Game faces, team!
W
Spirit of Fire Actual, we've secured the base, but our forces are scattered.
That's all the towers, Professor.
Uh, what's that sound?
Nothing like sowing a little chaos.
You know, just for once I'd like a straight up fight. There's the enemy, shoot the enemy, go home.
I
Scorpion here and ready for action.
Thanks for the assist, Red Team! Lead the way!
It'll be a pleasure, sir.
Heads up, troops! Friendlies!
The Spirit of Fire is standing by to assist, Jerome. Use everything you can, we have to keep the professor safe!
Turrets and restoration drones are online, call in support when you need it.
The Spirit of Fire's weapons are at your disposal, Spartan. Get this ship in the fight.
S
Scarab is down. Professor, how are we doing?
Keep the area clear for the Professor!
Professor, the Retriever's back!
I figured you two have had enough fun.
Don't worry, sir. We've got her. And it looks like we've got company right now.
B
Always got to show off, eh, Alice?
Stay down!
Who gets to take this one?
You know me well.
I
The Condor's on the way, Captain. Nothing like live combat to test a new design.
C
C
Whatever it is, it better work, Professor.
Good work, Professor. What about the communications beacon?
Isabel! What's the status of that new gunship? We need it now!
S
W
Did you make the same offer to the people you slaughtered at that outpost? We're not going anywhere.
T
Red Team, you have to hold the Banished back until the Professor's done her work.
There's a massive influx of Banished heading to your position, team.
The Banished aren't going to give us much time before they they throw everything they have at us. Be ready when they do.
This is it, team. Get ready to defend the Control Room. The Professor has to go down into the ring to deactivate its weapons systems and set up the comms beacon.
H
Put him through.
Where do you need us, sir?
You and I are survivors, and I respect that, so I offer you a boon: Take your troops, take your ship, leave now and I will not hunt you down.
H
Captain. Your troops fight with a tenacity that almost matches my Jiralhanae brothers. I'm impressed.
You think you can stand against me? I, who defied the Covenant itself!
J
I've marked three control towers. If you can secure those, I should be able to take control of the Retriever. Until then, keep out of its way!
Heightened security protocols kicked in as soon as the Halo left the Ark, but that may work in our favor.
But this time it's under our control - for now anyway.
Stand back, let's see what our new friend can do!
This Control Room has a defensive shield, but it won't last long. You just keep the wolves at bay.
Well, that's a little more complicated. I'm going to have to go down into the ring to set up the beacon. I'm going to need a little more time.
Red Team, the Banished have Warlords on the field overseeing their troops. Eliminating them will disrupt the Banished's chain of command.
Don't let them break through to the Control Room, team! If we lose the Professor, we lose everything!
Protect the Professor! She needs time to disarm the Halo!
Professor? Time is running out!
Scramble everything we've got!
Professor? What's the plan?
Good work, Red Team. We're going to need all the support we can get.
Reinforcements ready for your command, Red Team.
We have reinforcements standing by for you, Red Team.
We've got reinforcements for you now, Red Team.
Red Team, reinforcements are ready for you at the LZ.
We've failed. The ring is now under Atriox's control.
Good work. That will reduce the amount of Banished reinforcements on the battlefield.
Stop them reaching the Professor at all costs!
Focus on protecting the Professor!
Regroup everyone you can, but the priority is getting to that Control Room and disarming the Halo before it heads towards human space.
We've lost the Control Room,team. We've failed.
W
Watch out, team. The Banished have sent in artillery!
Make it fast, Professor.
W
My crew is ready for action, sir.
Payback time. Make it hurt, guys.
The Banished are attacking the Control Room, it's a little distracting!
It sounds like the Banished are trying to punch through the shield! I need some help here!
I'm under attack! Need a little help here!
I've gained control of the Halo's gravity anchors, Captain. Get our troops clear and get ready.
T
They've almost destroyed the shield!
All the more reason to gain control over that Retriever. You've got to secure those towers for me.
W
They're trying to destroy the shield! I can't disarm this thing if I'm dead!
That's helped speed things up, Jerome, I'm getting closer to taking control.
What?
It's only retreated for repairs. It'll be back soon.
The Retriever's in the vicinity, keep clear!
Heads up, the Retriever is close by!
Watch out, the Retriever is nearby, stay out of it's way!
Careful, that Retriever won't discriminate between us and the Banished!
Be on the lookout for that Retriever, it'll consider everyone here a threat!
The installation has released a Retriever! They're the Ark's most powerful sentinels!
We'll be sending in reinforcements directly from the ship just as soon as they're ready to deploy
The Banished are breaking through the shield!
The shield's nearly down, I won't be able to hold them back!
I'm in trouble, I need help!
Okay, that's opened up the system to me, but I'm still locked out from the full solution. If you take the other towers, I will be able to get control faster!
Red Team, we can't let the Banished take those points! We only have a limited time until that Halo leaves!
It's...complicated. So many protocols. I'm probably halfway there, I need more time.
I'm in, but I'm going to need some time to calibrate everything.
Our troops are clear, Professor. Whatever you're going to do, do it now.
T
Red Team, we have hostiles at the barrier! Won't be able to hold it for long!
Lock and load. No-one crosses that line.
W
Stay on target, Professor. This is what we're here for.
Shield generator
I have full control of the Retriever! Get to the shield generator, Red Team, and I'll clear the way.
